act(Hero) - Method in class Boss
Makes the Boss act by shooting fireballs, dashing, and making a water wave to deal damage to hero.

Changes its image if the Hero activates it and sets the Hero's respawn location.

Changes state of enemy according to position in game
act() - Method in class Fireball
Moves the Fireball according to its velocity.

Changes state of fireenemy in game
act(Hero, ArrayList<Shape>, ArrayList<Token>) - Method in class GrassEnemy
Moves based on where the Hero is.
act(ArrayList<Shape>, ArrayList<Enemy>, ArrayList<Token>, ArrayList<Spike>, ArrayList<MovingPlatform>) - Method in class Hero
Makes the Hero act by moving, being affected by gravity and friction, and get hurt if attacked by enemy.
act() - Method in class MovingPlatform
Moves the platform.
act(Hero, ArrayList<Shape>, ArrayList<Token>) - Method in class WaterEnemy
Waterenemy follows the the Hero until it is in range to do a water wave
act() - Method in class WaterWave
Expands waterwave outward
actualCoordinatesToAssumed(Point) - Method in class DrawingSurface

Sets the diameter of the Circle to it's current diameter combined with the inputed value.
